excerpt.value: Use the Site Bay Instances endpoints to create, configure, and manage your Site Bay instances. You can also manage the Site Bay Backup service; maintain and manage configuration profiles; create and maintain disks, intiate a host migration; view Site Bay Instance statistics; and more.

hits.excerpt: Use the Site Bay Instances endpoints to create, configure, and manage your Site Bay instances. You can also manage the Site Bay Backup service; maintain and manage configuration profiles; create and maintain disks, intiate a host migration; view Site Bay Instance statistics; and more.
